extendedInfo.description: Your house is the most valuable assets you own, so you need this application to keep it in perfect condition!"House Maintenance Schedule" is a calendar application to log date of routine maintenance done to your home, and to remind you about the due date of the next maintenance. As a reference, it also has an easy-to-follow, month-to-month guide for maintenance works needed by you home. So you will always know when to do, and what to do to keep your house in good shape, avoiding disastrous financial loss when problems show up.Key features include:-Maintenance records and friendly due date reminder.-Logs maintenances that need to be done annually, such as flushing water heater, inspecting fire extinguishers, pumping septic tank, changing oil for mower, checking safety reverse of garage door opener, sweeping Chimney and tuning up HVAC.- Logs maintenances that need to be done every 6 months, such as cleaning lint from clothes dryer, cleaning water inlet filters of washer, changing smoke/CO detector battery, cleaning gutter/downspouts, inspecting roof/siding/exterior caulking, and cleaning range hood and filter. *- Logs maintenances that need to be done every 3 months, such as changing water filter, changing air filter, checking water pump and sump pump. *-A month-by-month guide about what is needed inside/outside of your house and in your garden and yards.The Lite version of the program has limited functionality. If you want to get a fully functional version (also without AD), please upgrade to the "House Maintenance Schedule Pro". The application is developed by cooloy.com. Thanks for your support!* Only available in the Pro version: http://market.android.com/details?id=com.cooloy.HouseMaintenanceScheduleProKeywords: reminder, tips, property management, home project, real estate, home improvement

reviews.comment: Horrible, doesn\'t even deserve ONE star! Cannot add ur own and just has a list of pointless things-in my opinion! Uninstall, don\'t install!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovin it
reviews.comment: This has been very helpful,especially for those of us that are so busy,thanks for creating it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So helpful!
reviews.comment: There are probably more things they can list, but I can\'t think of any. Easy to read, use, and PERFECT for lazy homeowners with a bad memory!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpful!
reviews.comment: Cover most tasks.  Nice.

reviews.title: Need flexibility
reviews.comment: I would like to delete some of the items here that are not useful for my home and others that are.  Ap loads and works fine in its limited edition.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Should be able to add more, but still helpful!!!. Some of these things I hadn\'t thought of!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Substandard
reviews.comment: NO customization whatsoever, NO ability to add check off items. No reminders even. Pretty basic and not really worth the space on the phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap app
reviews.comment: Crap app. I can only do annual and semiannual schedules in free version. Why even put a free version out!

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time
